description:
Rain manages to save Allenby by destroying the Walter Gundam. Schwarz and Kyoji sacrifice themselves so Domon can destroy the Devil Gundam`s cockpit, defeating it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Schwarz Chiru! Domon Namida no Hissatsu Ken
Schwarz Rests in Grace! Domon`s Tearful Attack
Schwarz est tombé ! Les larmes de Domon
Schwarz ruht in Frieden! Domons tränenreiche Attacke
シュバルツ散る! ドモン涙の必殺拳
